iti63:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti63:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti63:3.4: they fall under the yoke of Death.
iti63:4.1: But having fully understood the communicable,
iti63:4.2: they don’t identify as a communicator,
iti63:4.3: as they’ve touched liberation with their mind,
iti63:5.2: peaceful, in love with the state of peace,
iti63:5.3: that knowledge-master is firm in principle;
iti63:5.4: they use reckonings, but can’t be reckoned.”
iti63:6.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
